wiki.content: "Too Close" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Alternative Songs Chart in the Summer of 2012. British singer-songwriter Alex Clare released “Too Close” as the 2nd single from his debut studio album “Lateness Of The Hour” back in 2011. In March 2012 “Too Close” was selected for a major TV commercial which saw the track achieve international success, peaking at No.4 in the UK singles chart. The renewed interest in Clare's music has prompted the 26 year old Golders Green native to head back into the studio to start work on a planned new EP. wiki.summary: "Too Close" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Alternative Songs Chart in the Summer of 2012. British singer-songwriter Alex Clare released “Too Close” as the 2nd single from his debut studio album “Lateness Of The Hour” back in 2011. In March 2012 “Too Close” was selected for a major TV commercial which saw the track achieve international success, peaking at No.4 in the UK singles chart. The renewed interest in Clare's music has prompted the 26 year old Golders Green native to head back into the studio to start work on a planned new EP.
